products.title: 2-Seater
products.description: This sofa converts quickly and easily into a spacious bed when you remove the back cushions and pull out the underframe.

products.title: Can 2-Seater Sofa
products.description: Anchor your living room in contemporary style with this two-piece living room set, including one sofa and one loveseat. Founded on solid and manufactured wood frames, each sofa features a full back, track arms, and tapered block legs in a dark finish. Enveloped in polyester upholstery, each sofa features biscuit tufting and detail stitching for a tailored touch, while thick foam seats and back cushions provide comfort and support. Patterned throw pillows complete the set.
